title: Parisiens Seine River Cruise
description: Relax on a classic 1-hour Seine cruise from the Eiffel Tower. Glide past the Louvre, Musée d’Orsay, Notre-Dame and historic bridges while listening on your phone with the included audio-guide app (onboard Wi-Fi helps you download it quickly).
features: Board near the Eiffel Tower (Port de la Bourdonnais, Pontoon #3)
Audio guide app in ~14 languages; paper route map on board
Indoor heated lounge + open-air deck; restrooms on board
Frequent departures all day; evening sailings available
startPoint: Port de la Bourdonnais (Eiffel Tower), Pontoon #3
seasonalDepartures: Roughly every 30–45 min, from late morning into the evening (times vary by season).

title: Bateaux Mouches Seine Cruise
description: See Paris from the river on a famous Bateaux Mouches boat. Spacious open decks and a glass-covered lounge offer great views year-round. Commentary is available and a multilingual route map helps you follow along.
features: Departs near Pont de l’Alma (Port de la Conférence, 75008)
Approx. 1h10 sightseeing loop on the Seine
Commentary available in English or French + route map in many languages
Frequent daytime and evening departures (more often in summer)
startPoint: Port de la Conférence (near Pont de l’Alma), 75008 Paris
seasonalDepartures: About every 30 min (Apr–Sep) and ~every 45 min (Oct–Mar), typically 10:00–22:30.

itineraryStops.title: Boarding at Port de la Conférence
Turn near Île de la Cité
Return to Port de la Conférence

title: Big Bus + Seine Cruise Combo
description: Combine a 24- or 48-hour hop-on hop-off bus pass with a 1-hour Seine cruise. Cover Paris’ top sights by open-top bus (audio guide + Wi-Fi), then board your river cruise at the Eiffel Tower.
features: HOHO bus: 24h or 48h ticket with multilingual audio
Cruise: 1-hour sightseeing boat from the Eiffel Tower
Bus app with live tracking; Wi-Fi & headphones included
Cruise partner: Bateaux Parisiens (Eiffel Tower pontoon)
startPoint: Cruise at Port de la Bourdonnais (Eiffel Tower), Pontoon #3; bus from any Big Bus stop
audioLanguages: Multilingual audio on bus; cruise audio via partner
seasonalDepartures: Cruise roughly every 45 min; bus every ~10–20 min.

itineraryStops.title: Start: Any Big Bus stop
itineraryStops.note: Scan pass and ride to Eiffel Tower

itineraryStops.title: Arrive: Eiffel Tower stop
itineraryStops.note: Walk to Port de la Bourdonnais
